data.title: Marisa Pavan
data.meta_description: This section is dedicated to all the people who have helped Margaux Soumoy in her biographical project on Marisa Pavan.
data.text:
Since I began working on this long-term biographical project in 2015, I have had the privilege to run across several wonderful people. This section is dedicated to them.
